content: >in honor of the birth of my first grandson lincoln i designed this special blanket and knit two for him already i hope you enjoy making this blanket as much as i did ------ this basketweave style baby blanket features fun bobbles a wavy lace pattern and some elongated cable stitches the garter edging is worked along with the blanket and to improve the structure of the blanket some short row were added along the edging **sizes ** s m l **approximate measurements** s = 26 x 32 / 66 x 70 cm m= 32 x 32 / 81 x 81 cm l = 37 ½ x 40 / 96 5 x 104 cm size is easily adjustable **yarn** worsted weight yellow sample shown is size s and was worked in yarn stormers hand dyed 100% superwash merino 220 yds per 100g skein in marigold 3 4 5 skeins multicolored sample is size m and was worked in cascade nifty cotton splash 100% cotton 185 yds per 100g skein in 218 sulphur lake 4 4 5 skeins **approximate yardage** 600 700 900 yds **gauge** 18 sts and 24 row=4 in st st 18 sts and 30 sts = 4 in garter st after blocking gauge is not too important but will affect the final size and amount of yarn needed **needles** main us size 7 4 5mm straights or long circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge edging us size 6 4mm straights or long circular needle or needle one size smaller than main needle **skill level ** intermediate **techniques to know ** making bobbles instructional video provided increases and decreases simple lace sts simple cables german short row or comparable method
